Sql.query: select trn_docdescarga.*, (select doccatnombre from trn_doccategoria where doccatcodi=trn_docdescarga.doccatcodi) as nombCategoria from trn_docdescarga where docdescodi = :docdescodi

insert into trn_docdescarga ( docdescodi, doccatcodi, pericodi, docdesversion, docdesnombre, docdesdescripcion,docdesusername, docdesfecins ) values (:docdescodi, :doccatcodi, :pericodi, :docdesversion, :docdesnombre, :docdesdescripcion,:docdesusername, :docdesfecins )

update trn_docdescarga set doccatcodi = :doccatcodi, pericodi= :pericodi, docdesversion = :docdesversion, docdesnombre=:docdesnombre, docdesdescripcion=:docdesdescripcion where docdescodi = :docdescodi

select trn_docdescarga.*, (select doccatnombre from trn_doccategoria where doccatcodi=trn_docdescarga.doccatcodi) as nombCategoria from trn_docdescarga where (trn_docdescarga.doccatcodi = :doccatcodi or :doccatcodi is null) and (trn_docdescarga.docdesversion = :docdesversion or :docdesversion is null) and (trn_docdescarga.pericodi = :pericodi or :pericodi is null) order by trn_docdescarga.docdescodi desc

select * from trn_docdescarga where (trn_docdescarga.doccatcodi = :doccatcodi or :doccatcodi is null) and (trn_docdescarga.pericodi = :pericodi or :pericodi is null) order by trn_docdescarga.docdescodi desc
